faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about Ripplefy

questions.question: How fast can I get set up with Ripplefy?
questions.answer: Most restaurants complete setup in under 30 minutes. Simply sign up, upload your menu, customize your branding, and you're ready to go. No technical expertise required.

questions.question: Do I need to buy any hardware?
questions.answer: No! Ripplefy is 100% cloud-based and works on any device. You can use your existing tablets, phones, or computers. Optional: We support kitchen printers for order tickets.

questions.question: Can I try Ripplefy before committing?
questions.answer: Absolutely! We offer a 14-day free trial with full access to all features. No credit card required. Plus, a 30-day money-back guarantee.

questions.question: Does Ripplefy work with my existing POS?
questions.answer: Yes, Ripplefy integrates with most major POS systems. Our team can help you set up the integration during onboarding.

questions.question: Is the WhatsApp waiting list feature included in all plans?
questions.answer: The WhatsApp waiting list is included in Professional and Enterprise plans. It's one of our most loved features!

questions.question: Can I use Ripplefy for multiple restaurant locations?
questions.answer: Yes! The Enterprise plan is specifically designed for multi-branch operations with centralized management and branch-level reporting.

questions.question: Is my data secure?
questions.answer: Absolutely. We use bank-level encryption and are GDPR compliant. Your data is backed up daily and stored on secure cloud servers.

questions.question: What languages does Ripplefy support?
questions.answer: Ripplefy fully supports English and Arabic, including RTL (Right-to-Left) layout for Arabic. Your digital menus can display in both languages simultaneously.

questions.question: What kind of support do you offer?
questions.answer: We offer 24/7 customer support via email and chat. Professional plan users get priority support, and Enterprise clients get dedicated phone support.

questions.question: Can I cancel anytime?
questions.answer: Yes, you can cancel your subscription at any time. No long-term contracts or cancellation fees.
